sentences.sContent: One evaluation has shown that 70% of the people who received the new glasses corrected their own vision at least as well, if not better, than a trained optometrist.
sentences.sContent_eng: One evaluation has shown that 70% of the people who received the new glasses corrected their own vision at least as well, if not better, than a trained optometrist.
sentences.sCn: 评价表明，在得到新型眼镜的人中，有70％的人最起码与一位训练有素的验光配镜师一样很好地矫正了其视力。

words.tran: 验光；[眼科] 视力测定法

trans.tranOther: someone who tests people’s eyes and orders glasses for them
